import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar2 from './Navbar2' import Footer from './Footer' import { Breadcrumb, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEdit, faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../CSS/style.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { DropdownDivider } from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; export default class Services extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ name:'', email:'', contact:'', address:'', category:'', restaurant:'', location:'', time:'', date: new Date(), seats:'', parking:'', userId:'', list:[], //for all bookings of a user } this.state.list2= JSON.parse( localStorage.getItem('login')); this.state.userId = this.state.list2[0].id //to fetch all bookings for a perticular user session fetch(`http://localhost:8080/users/${this.state.userId}/currentBookings`).then((resp) => { resp.json().then((data) => { this.setState({ list:data }) }) }) } render() { return (
